translations: n.英国本土；英国老家（等于 blighty）

phrs.translation: 英国本土, 怎么翻译及发音

sentences.sentence: Darling, any news about our blighty?
The soldier are sailing for old Blighty tomorrow.
sentences.translation: 士兵明日将启航返英国本土。

sentences.sentence: But as our Blighty blog points out in its report on the speech, he managed to do so almost entirely without using the word "cut".
sentences.translation: 但是正如我们的Blighty博客对这篇演讲的有关报道指出的那样，他设法说明这一点而几乎不用“削减”一词。
